title: Graves will get gutted with -3 ad

replies.body: People dont realise how much -3 or -5 ad does to a champ.. My champ {{champion:39}} literally had the worst laning phase only because of a -30hp and -3 ad nerf.

> [{quoted}](name=Mordepool,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JEFlJ9Gn,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-10-06T03:18:05.095+0000)
>
> https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/masseffect/images/c/c9/You-keep-using-that-word.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160826222827
> 
> 
> Gutted

Elise,  A ap champion got -3% winrate from a -3ad change.  Its a massive change that lowers overall their health and their snowball potential .

Even if he does get gutted...

thatâ€™s exactly what I want to happen
Jokes on you, they're setting him up for compensation buffs.
